title: [1.12.X]原版指令,用指令做一把饮血剑！
author: 残影257
txt_content:
第一次(划掉)发帖，有亿点紧张
之前还发错地方了
不废话了，上ooc
/summon falling_block ~ ~1.5 ~ {Time:1,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Motion:[0d,-1d,0d],Passengers:[{id:falling_block,Time:1,Block:"minecraft:activator_rail",Passengers:[{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~ ~-2 ~ {auto:0b,Command:\"\"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"scoreboard objectives add 饮血剑 stat.useItem.minecraft.stone_sword"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"setblock ~2 ~4 ~0 command_block 1 replace {Command:\"/give @p minecraft:stone_sword 1 0 {ench:[{id:16s,lvl:10s},{id:17s,lvl:3s},{id:18s,lvl:3s},{id:20s,lvl:1s},{id:22s,lvl:5s},{id:34s,lvl:10s},{id:70s,lvl:1s}],display:{Name:\\\"饮血剑\\\",Lore:[\\\"     --===--\\\",\\\"饮血剑\\\",\\\"作者:mc_Ye_HSWS\\\",\\\"（太懒没有搞彩色字体）\\\",\\\"     --===--\\\",]},Unbreakable:1,AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:909197483,UUIDMost:909197483,Amount:10,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack,Slot:mainhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:-5527454,UUIDMost:-5527454,Amount:46,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health,Slot:mainhand},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1109049037,UUIDMost:1109049037,Amount:-2.4,AttributeName:generic.attackSpeed,Name:AttackSpeed,Slot:mainhand}]}\"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"setblock ~2 ~2 ~0 chain_command_block 1 replace {Command:\"execute @a[tag=yxj,score_饮血剑_min=1] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players set @s 饮血剑 0\",auto:1b}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"setblock ~2 ~1 ~0 chain_command_block 1 replace {Command:\"execute @a[tag=yxj,score_饮血剑_min=1] ~ ~ ~ effect @s regeneration 1 4 true\",auto:1b}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"setblock ~2 ~0 ~0 chain_command_block 1 replace {Command:\"scoreboard players tag @a add yxj {SelectedItem:{id:\\\"minecraft:stone_sword\\\",Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:\\\"饮血剑\\\"}}}}\",auto:1b}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"setblock ~2 ~3 ~0 repeating_command_block 1 replace {Command:\"scoreboard players tag @a remove yxj\",auto:1b}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"setblock ~2 ~-1 ~0 repeating_command_block 1 replace {Command:\"scoreboard players tag @a add yxj {SelectedItem:{id:\\\"minecraft:stone_sword\\\",Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:\\\"饮血剑\\\"}}}}\",auto:1b}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"setblock ~2 ~-2 ~0 repeating_command_block 1 replace {Command:\"scoreboard players set @a[tag=!yxj] 饮血剑 0\",auto:1b}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"setblock ~ ~1 ~ command_block 0 replace {auto:1b,Command:\"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~-2 ~ air\"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"kill @e[type=commandblock_minecart,r=1]"}]}]}

最上面的icb是获得饮血剑的命令方块
本人指令萌新，不喜勿喷
原理我相信大部分人都知道，如果有人回复问原理，那就让dalao回复吧a.a

replies.author: K_KaKu
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 你的小菠萝
replies.txt_content: 一看就会，一用就飞，不过谢谢分享
